author: Cleo Abram
description:
This chimpanzee is using a STICK to eat termites! This is huge because for a long time we thought that only us humans made and used tools…

… Until Jane Goodall carefully studied chimps in Tanzania in 1960.

She revealed they were much more complex than we had ever thought, teaching us so much more about our closest relatives... and ourselves.

Thank you, Jane Goodall. We’ll miss you.

#shorts #chimpanzees #science #janegoodall #animals
title: How Smart Are Chimps Really?
